package.name: comau_ns16hand_moveit_plugin
package.description: The comau_ns16hand_moveit_plugin package The package is derived from the automatically generated package using rosrun moveit_ikfast create_ikfast_moveit_plugin.py. Two patches are applied: (1) comau_ns16hand_manipulator_ikfast_solver.cpp (autogenerated from ikfast.py) has been modified to make homogeneous the input of the IK function. (2) comau_ns16hand_manipulator_ikfast_moveit_plugin.cpp (autogenerated from create_ikfast_moveit_plugin.py) has been modified in order to make it robust on the modification of srdf file.
package.author: Nicola Pedrocchi
Enrico Villagrossi
Alberto Marini
Manuel Beschi
